attributes.action: change the Freedom of Information Act so that the royal house hold and communications between the household and government are no longer exempt
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The royal household, and all communications between the household and the government are exempt from the FOI Act. 

The 'household' includes staff and managers, not just members of the family.  Given that the household is principally funded by the taxpayer there should be no exemption from FOI rules.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to change the Freedom of Information Act so that the royal house hold and communications between the household and government are no longer exempt.

Her Majesty's Government has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.hmg.gov.uk/epetition-responses/petition-view.aspx?epref=householdfoi


Her Majesty's Government
